clip.quote: Every dollar of net income in a sole proprietorship is subject to self-employment tax, but with an S-Corp, you can avoid this by paying yourself a reasonable salary.
clip.why_clipworthy: This provides a clear, actionable tip for reducing tax liability, which is a common concern for real estate agents.
clip.suggested_hook: Are you paying too much in self-employment taxes? Here's how an S-Corp can save you money.

clip.quote: Setting up an LLC is very easy and provides essential asset protection for real estate agents.
clip.why_clipworthy: It highlights a simple yet effective strategy for protecting personal assets, a critical concern for agents.
clip.suggested_hook: Protect your assets with this simple step every real estate agent should consider.
